headline: 5 Ways Retirees Can Offset Income When Social Security Falls Short
summary: Social Security was originally designed to be a supplemental form of retirement income. Under the three-legged stool model, retirees ideally live on a combination of employer pensions (or more likely 401(k)s and IRAs), personal savings and Social Security. But many retirees struggle to make ends meet, with some relying solely on Social Security. Whatever your ... 5 Ways Retirees Can Offset Income When Social Security Falls Short

headline: 3 Russell 2000 Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: The Russell 2000 (^RUT) is home to many small-cap stocks, offering investors the chance to uncover hidden gems before the broader market catches on. However, these companies often come with higher volatility and risk, as their smaller size makes them more vulnerable to economic downturns.

raw.headline: 3 Russell 2000 Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
raw.summary: The Russell 2000 (^RUT) is home to many small-cap stocks, offering investors the chance to uncover hidden gems before the broader market catches on. However, these companies often come with higher volatility and risk, as their smaller size makes them more vulnerable to economic downturns.

headline: Lumen Refocuses On Enterprise AI As AT&T Takes Consumer Fiber
summary: Lumen Technologies (NYSE:LUMN) received ISO 42001 certification for its AI Management System, described as an industry first. The company also announced the sale of its remaining consumer fiber network assets to AT&T. These moves reflect a stronger emphasis on enterprise services and formal AI governance. Lumen Technologies, known for its network and enterprise communications services, is leaning further into its role as a provider to business and government customers. The ISO 42001...
